mapper.select: INSERT IGNORE INTO devops_env_app_service (app_service_id, env_id) VALUES (#{appServiceId}, #{envId});
SELECT d.app_service_id FROM devops_env_app_service d WHERE d.env_id = #{envId}

SELECT DISTINCT der.name resourceName, derd.message detail FROM devops_app_service_instance dai JOIN devops_env_resource der ON der.instance_id = dai.id JOIN devops_env_resource_detail derd ON derd.id = der.resource_detail_id WHERE dai.app_service_id = #{appServiceId} AND dai.env_id = #{envId} AND der.kind = 'Deployment'
